subject: Football
Wages and Salaries
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Penn State Coach Joe Paterno’s salary, long a secret, was released by the Pennsylvania State Employees’ Retirement System after The Patriot-News of Harrisburg won a five-year court case.
snippet: Penn State Coach Joe Paterno’s salary, long a secret, was released by the Pennsylvania State Employees’ Retirement System after The Patriot-News of Harrisburg won a five-year court case.
